item.title: Hiroshima marks 80 years since U.S. atomic bombing
item.description: The United States dropped the world's first atomic bomb on Hiroshima, Japan, on Aug. 6, 1945, during World War II.

item.title: 8/6: CBS Morning News
item.description: Ghislaine Maxwell didn't implicate President Trump in DOJ interview about Epstein, source says; China reportedly limits supply of rare earth materials...

item.title: Hundreds more deaths are attributable to L.A. wildfires, new study finds
item.description: The Los Angeles wildfires took 30 lives at the beginning of this year, but a new study estimates there were hundreds more deaths that are attributable...

item.title: Trump hits India with additional 25% tariff over Russian oil imports
item.description: Mr. Trump said he was imposing the additional 25% tariff because India continues to buy oil from Russia.

item.title: Putin, Trump envoy Witkoff meet ahead of Trump Ukraine war accord deadline
item.description: The Russian president and Trump emissary held talks in Moscow days before the White House deadline for Russia to reach a peace deal with Ukraine.
